titles.title: Fuel Freedom Act of 2008
Fuel Freedom Act of 2008
To amend title 49, United States Code, to require that any automobile manufactured by a manufacturer after model year 2018 be an alternative fueled automobile.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Fuel Freedom Act of 2008 - Requires each automobile manufactured after model year 2018 to be an alternative fueled automobile.
Makes a manufacturer liable for a civil penalty of up to $10,000 for each automobile manufactured in violation of this requirement.
